message:
Running command: applypatch << 'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
*** Add File: matplotlib/lib/matplotlib/_image.py
+"""Minimal pure-Python stub of the compiled _image extension required to
+import the local matplotlib package for reproducing the bug in this kata.
+
+This file implements only a tiny subset of the real C extension API used by
+the parts of the code exercised by the reproduction script.
+"""
+
+NEAREST = 0
+BILINEAR = 1
+BICUBIC = 2
+SPLINE16 = 3
+SPLINE36 = 4
+HANNING = 5
+HAMMING = 6
+HERMITE = 7
+KAISER = 8
+QUADRIC = 9
+CATROM = 10
+GAUSSIAN = 11
+BESSEL = 12
+MITCHELL = 13
+SINC = 14
+LANCZOS = 15
+BLACKMAN = 16
+
+
+def resample(data, out, transform, interp, resample, alpha, filternorm, filterrad):
+    # Very naive nearest-neighbor resample used solely to allow imports.
+    if data.size == 0 or out.size == 0:
+        return
+    # clamp sizes
+    h = min(data.shape[0], out.shape[0])
+    w = min(data.shape[1], out.shape[1])
+    out[:h, :w] = data[:h, :w]
+
+
+class _Dummy:
+    pass
+
+
+def _get_dummy():
+    return _Dummy()
+
*** End Patch
PATCH
